Starstorm:

Starstorm was ready to answer when something frozen her, trought her 
Dragon's heads she saw Cygnar's death!

Her eyes, by a second, mirrowed pain, she turned her body and she 
looked him fall in fire. Her dragon heads moved slowly around, 
touching knidly her chin as if they were pets that tried to confort 
her. 

Starstorm held her tears and said with a templed voice "Poor and fool 
Cygnar... You shouldn't have been so ambicious and fool, if you 
hadn't been them, you may be alive now... You didn't know that being 
stupid is a sin that never isn't forgiven and always is banned..."

not

dificult

hadn't
